00020 int fromsock, tosock;     //fds for fifos
00021 
00022 int listenForSLRR(SockLibRequestResponse &s, int timeout) {
00023   fd_set read_fds;
00024   int rc, maxfd;
00025   struct timeval tv;
00026 
00027   tv.tv_sec = timeout;
00028   tv.tv_usec = 0;
00029 
00030   FD_ZERO(&read_fds);
00031   FD_SET(fromsock, &read_fds);
00032   maxfd = fromsock;
00033 
00034   rc = select(maxfd+1, &read_fds, 0, 0, &tv);
00035   if (rc<0) {
00036     if (errno!=EINTR);
00037     return -1;
00038   }
00039   else if (rc==0)
00040     return 0;
00041   else if (FD_ISSET(fromsock, &read_fds)) {
00042     s.Unserialize(fromsock);
00043     return 1;
00044   }
00045   return -1;
00046 }

00244           in = -1;
00245       }

00248       if (rc<0)
00249         cerr << "unexpected error\n";
00250       else if (rc==0)
00251         cout << "timeout occured, no slrr received" << endl;
00252       else {
